title: Embach appears at Komets practice
text:
Embach appears at Komets practice 
By Tommy Schoegler - 21Alive Embach appears at Komets practice October 8, 2015 Updated Oct 8, 2015 at 2:04 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21Alive) - Mike Embach appeared at Fort Wayne Komets practice on Thursday, a sign the winger could be returning to the team. 
The Komets have not provided an official status on Embach with the team. 
Digital Daily – subscribe to our daily newsletter 
Embach returned to the United States earlier he and Finnish club Leksand IF agreed to part ways. He appeared in 9 games, scoring 1 goal (1 point). BREAKING: Mike Embach at @FWKomets practice today. Still no official word from team but it appears winger is back for 3rd season. #Komets — 21Alive Sports (@21AliveSoundOff) October 8, 2015 
Embach spent the last bulk of the last two seasons in Fort Wayne. In 69 regular season games last season, he scored 24 goals and 46 assists (70 points). He added 5 goals and 8 assists (13 points) in the playoffs. 
He was also lent to Norfolk of the American Hockey League for three games last year.   To submit a comment on this article, your email address is required. We respect your privacy and your email will not be visible to others nor will it be added to any email lists. Most Viewed
